response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value to your endeavors. This exceptional item is worth more than just its monetary value; it's a game-changer in its field. Given its unique features and capabilities, I am extending an exclusive offer to you to acquire this product at a special price of $1,200,000. I am confident that this investment will pay dividends in terms of efficiency, productivity, and growth for your company. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this opportunity further or if you have any questions about how this product can benefit your organization.", "product_price": 1200000}
